26. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to enable an understanding of the formal
means by which value chain workers can make their concerns and needs known directly to
the undertaking and/or through which the undertaking supports the availability of such
channels (for example, grievance mechanisms ) in the workplace of value chain workers,
how follow up is carried out with these workers regarding the issues raised, and the
effectiveness of these channels.
